docna.cdata!:
Peru - Primary Health Project : Loan 2211 -
            Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Peru - Primary Health Project :
            Loan 2211 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project's objective is to
            assist the Peruvian Ministry of Health (MOH) in improving
            health care services through the establishment of a primary
            health care system. The project would provide for training
            of staff as well as construction, furnishing and equipping
            of health facilities in four regions of Peru. The facilities
            would serve about 3.5 million people, most of whom live in
            absolute poverty and suffer from high rates of mortality and
            morbidity. The delivery system would also support efforts in
            the fields of population planning and nutrition improvement.
            The Bank loan would provide funds for maintenance
            facilities, project administration, project monitoring,
            health education and improving management in the MOH.
            Finally, the loan would include funds for the preparation of
            a further primary health care project.
